articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Vladimir Putin said he assumed Ukraine would follow Russia's example.
articles.title: Russia's Putin declares unilateral Easter ceasefire in Ukraine

articles.author: Erin Banco
articles.description: Israel has not ruled out an attack on Iran's nuclear facilities in the coming months despite President Donald Trump telling Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu that the U.S. was for now unwilling to support such a move, according to an Israeli official and two other people familiar with the matter.
articles.title: Exclusive: Israel still eyeing a limited attack on Iran's nuclear facilities
Iran, US to hold talks in Rome in bid to reach nuclear deal

articles.author: Andrew Chung, Luc Cohen, Kristina Cooke, Jack Queen
articles.description: The case raises questions about the Trump administration's adherence to limits set by the Supreme Court. It carries the risk of a significant clash between the two coequal branches of government and potentially a full-blown constitutional crisis.
articles.title: US Supreme Court temporarily blocks deportations of Venezuelan migrants under wartime law

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Sitting in a crowd of mothers and children under the harsh sun, Najlaa Ahmed described the moment the Rapid Support Forces men poured into Darfur's Zamzam displacement camp, looting and burning homes as shells rained down and drones flew overhead.
articles.title: Survivors describe executions, arson in attack on Sudan's Zamzam camp

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Oman's Sultan Haitham bin Tariq al-Said is set to visit Moscow on Monday, days after the start of a round of Muscat-mediated nuclear talks between the U.S. and Iran.
articles.title: Oman's sultan to meet Putin in Moscow after Iran-US talks

articles.author: Mohammad Yunus Yawar, Charlotte Greenfield
articles.description: The Taliban's acting foreign minister on Saturday expressed "concern and sadness" during a rare meeting with Pakistan's foreign minister over the deportation of tens of thousands of Afghans, according to a statement.
articles.title: Taliban minister expresses concern to Pakistan over Afghan repatriation drive

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: A Tunisian court handed jail terms ranging from 13 to 66 years to opposition leaders, businessmen and lawyers on charges of conspiring against state security, TAP state news agency said.
articles.title: Tunisia hands jail terms ranging from 13 to 66 years to opposition figures

articles.author: Mubasher Bukhari
articles.description: A Christian man accused of blasphemy in the eastern Pakistani town of Jaranwala will appeal against a death sentence handed down by an anti-terrorism court, his lawyer said on Saturday.
articles.title: Pakistani Christian man to appeal death sentence for blasphemy

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: It was the latest in a series of exchanges.
articles.title: Ukraine, Russia swap POWs, other prisoners involving more than 500 people
